title: The Braised Red Cabbage & Apples I Made
summary: The Braised Red Cabbage & Apples I Made is a gluten free and vegetarian side dish. One portion of this dish contains about 2g of protein, 3g of fat, and a total of 78 calories. For 35 cents per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 8. Head to the store and pick up apple, apple cider vinegar, butter, and a few other things to make it today. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 37%. This score is not so amazing. Similar recipes include Braised Red Cabbage (with Apples), Braised Red Cabbage and Apples, and Braised Cabbage and Apples.
